text: Hey folks, I was trying to use `Parameters.jl`  to define a struct with default values for my model. But I am hitting that `recursive_unitless_eltype` error on the struct. Is this where I should be using `ComponentArrays` instead of a struct? Can I define initial values with ComponentArrays or is there a recommended way to define a struct with initial values--as opposed to having some long constructor?
